channel.title: Python on metafunctor
channel.description: Recent content in Python on metafunctor

item.title: AlgoTree: Comprehensive Tree Structure Algorithms in Python
item.description: Explore the AlgoTree package, a suite of utilities for working with tree-like data structures in Python using a generic API (duck typing).

item.title: ollama_data_tools: Tools for working with Ollama model data.
item.description: Ollama Data Tools is a Python package and set of command line tools for working with Ollama model data, including searching, filtering, exporting,a and adapting for use with other inference engines like llamacpp.

item.title: SLUUG: Demystifying Large Language Models (LLMs) on Linux: From Theory to Application
item.description: Presented for the St. Louis Unix Users Group (SLUUG) on Large Language Models (LLMs) on Linux, titled ‘Demystifying Large Language Models (LLMs) on Linux: From Theory to Application’.
